description: An outdoor place in Dhaka city surrounded by lush-greenery located at Notun Bazar 150 feet Road, after second bridge. It is a perfect place in Dhaka city to have some leisure time escape and enjoy nature. This venue is suitable for arranging events like Holud Celebration, Rong Khela, Akhth, Wedding Celebration, Wedding Reception, Birthday Celebration, Reunion, Iftar Party, Picnic, Concert or Corporate programme. We also have an awesome football turf for playing football in rental basis, a swimming pool which is also we provide on rental basis per a certain time duration.
location:
Madani Avenue, Satarkul, Dhaka.
(On 100 ft Main Road, 3 km East of US Embassy, 1st Crossroad/Chowrasta after 2nd Bridge, Just East of United Group's Office)

policies.payment_terms:
i) At least 50% of total rent shall be deposited as confirmation of booking.
ii) The balance amount shall be paid at least 15 days  prior to the event.,
iii) If the event is cancelled by the customer *within 60 days of the event, 50% of the full rent* will be deducted and the balance amount will be returned.
iv) If the event is cancelled by the customer *before 60 days of the event, 25% of the full rent* will be deducted and the balance amount will be returned.
policies.legal_terms_or_rules:
1) No *unlawful activities or alcoholic beverages* are allowed in the venue.
2) For any *breach of the law* by the participants or guests, the customer will be responsible for solving the issue.

faqs.question: What is venue rent for events or programs?
faqs.answer:
1) 1 day package (Decoration & Event on the same day - 12:30 am to 11:00 pm): Tk 3,50,000 per day, or, 
2) 2 days package (1 day event+1 day decoration): Tk 500,000. or,
3) 3 days package (1 day event+2 days decoration): Tk 6,00,000.
4) Post Event *Garbage Clean Up* Charge: Tk 15,000.

faqs.question: What is your refund/return policy?
faqs.answer:
1) If the event is cancelled by the customer *within 60 days of the event, 50% of the full rent* will be deducted and the balance amount will be returned.
2) If the event is cancelled by the customer *before 60 days of the event, 25% of the full rent* will be deducted and the balance amount will be returned.

faqs.question: Do you provide decor, event planner or caterer?
faqs.answer: You have the *freedom to choose* any decor, event planner or caterer. You and your decorator shall start *removing decor items* after your event at 12:05 am and complete removal of all items within 6 am so that the next party can start the decoration at 12:30 am.

faqs.question: What's included in the venue rent for event or program?
faqs.answer:
The followings are included in the above mentioned rent:
i) *Open Space:* Open area of 60,000 sft or 4 bigha in the total project area of 8 bigha.
ii) *VIP Guest Rooms:* There are 2 rooms, one with air-con, for special guests.
iii) *Prayer Room & Ablution:* A masjid with odhu khana (ablution) is available in the venue.
iv) *Toilets & Wash:* Separate toilets for ladies and gents in 4 locations - 7 toilets with high commodes, 5 urinals, 14 wash basins & 3 low commodes.
v) *Kitchen:* Foods can be cooked in the venue or brought from outside.
vi) *Water:* Potable or drinking water is provided from the deep tube wells at free of cost.
vii) *Car Parks:* 100 cars can be parked in our own premises and 200 cars in the adjacent roads.
viii) *Electricity:* Free of cost electricity is provided during the preparation, decoration and testing till the start of event.
(*Diesel Generator* will be required for atleast 10 to 15 hours during the core event time with separately agreed payment).

faqs.question: Is there any promotional discount for event venue rent?
faqs.answer: There will be a special discount of 40% on venue rent for your event to be held  from April to October 2025.

faqs.question: What are the additional services/amenities do you provide?
faqs.answer:
The following optional services are provided with separately agreed payments-
i) *Event planning & decoration*
ii) *Food or Catering*
iii) *Utensils and furniture* rental.
iv) *Mosquito control* with smoke of dhup during the event: Tk 6,000 to Tk 10,000 per day.
v) *Generator Rent:* Tk 10,000 to Tk 40,000 per day.
vi) *Swimming pool:* for swimming, pool side party Tk Tk 50,000 To Tk 1,00,000.
vii) *Turf Field:* for playing football & cricket only Tk 50,000 to Tk 1,00,000.

faqs.question: Why you are unique?
faqs.answer: It's a well-secured and one of the most suitable venues in Dhaka City for outdoor programs, games & recreation having ample land area, green fields & shed under green trees and is located at a very popular location in Madani Avenue.
